Summary: bright light flashing randomly and changing direction (triangle like flight path)
divs: Sighting DetailsI had just pulled up in front of my house and was getting out of my car with my girlfriend. I always look up at the night sky and just happend to notice somthing that looked like a star going out. I thought it was a star going out. It looked like a white star that was randomly flashing, and every time it would flash it was in a different location. It seemed to move in a tringular pattern. I felt rather excited to see it at first when i saw it. Then when i realized i we did not know what it was i started to feel unsure of my surroundings. When i finnaly lost sight of the object it had stoped flashing all together.
